## Installation of required packages:

```{r }
#DESeq2
if (!requireNamespace("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE))
    install.packages("BiocManager")
BiocManager::install("DESeq2")
#Factoextra
install.packages("factoextra")
#knitr
install.packages("knitr")
```
